title: 将物品锁定背包固定位置
txt_content: 怎么将物品锁定背包固定的位置，比如石剑锁定到背包第一个地方

replies.txt_content:
2759159258 发表于 2017-9-12 12:31
/scoreboard objectives add
/scoreboard objectives add 1 stat.useItem.minecraft.stone_sword
/execute @a[score_1=3,score_1_min=3] ~ ~ ~ /enchant @p 19 2
/scoreboard players set @a 1 0

replies.author: chyx
